title: 2017年民调：30%以上的巴西人认为独裁统治比民主制度更好，大家对此有何看法？
contents:
According to a 2017 Pew poll, over 30 percent of Brazilians believe democracy is a bad way to govern. 

Almost 40 percent offered some support for rule by the military.
